questions.question: As a result of the Chinese Civil War. . .

choices.answer: China became a democratic nation.
The US policy of containment was shown to be successful.
There are currently two Chinese nations in existance.
The United Nations proved to be a weak international organization.

questions.question: NATO was unique in that it. . .

choices.answer: was the first time an international force was sent to defend a nation.
was the first time the US joined a military alliance during peace time.
was the first international organization created to maintain peace.
was the first time an alliance included nations from Aisa and Europe.

questions.question: The main reason the Communist were able to win the Chinese Civil War was due to. . .

choices.answer: the support they recieved from the peasantry.
their great military support from the Soviet Union.
the massive desertion of Nationalist troops.
the Nationalist still fighting against Japanese troops.

questions.question: Where did the Nationalists establish a democratic Chinese nation?

choices.answer: In Mongolia.
In Vietnam.
On the island of Madagascar.
On the island of Taiwan.

questions.question: Which of the following is false of NATO?

choices.answer: It included nations from Europe and North America.
It was a defensive military alliance.
No member of NATO has ever been attacked by another nation.
It was formed in response to the construction of the Berlin Wall.
